item.title: Syncronization patterns
item.description: We study chimera states and dissipative solitons syncronization patterns in delayed feedback systems. High dynamics multistability and robustness of those self-regenerating systems makes them suitable for photonic memory applications. Based on existing hardware, this memory is compatible with photonic reservoir computing.
